name: splitting-image
description: Microlibrary to split a DOM element image with elements populated with CSS vars.

scripts.build: rollup src/splitting-image.js --output.format umd --name 'SplittingImage' --output.file splitting-image.js && uglifyjs -c -m -o splitting-image.min.js -- splitting-image.js && npm run sizes
scripts.sizes: gzip -9 -c splitting-image.min.js | wc -c && cat splitting-image.min.js | wc -c

author: Stephen Shaw (stephen@brokensquare.com)
